name: habitica-slack
description: Send and receive messages from a Habitica Party Chat to a Slack Channel

DJANGO_SECRETKEY.description: Secret key for your Django instance (autogenerated).

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: Your Slack Channel ID (you can get this from the channel URL, e.g. for https://yourworkspace.slack.com/messages/C2M7P8H32/, channel id would be C2M7P8H32

SLACK_TOKEN.description: Your Slack App Verification Token (found in your Slack App Credentials under https://api.slack.com/apps > <Your App>).

SLACK_WEBHOOK.description: Your Slack App Incoming WebHook URL (found in your Slack App Incoming Webhooks under  https://api.slack.com/apps > <Your App> > Incoming Webhooks).

HABITICA_USERNAME.description: Habitica username is required otherwise any message you send from Slack will also be duplicated back to Slack.

FILTER_USER_ID.description: Only allow messages to be sent from a Slack user with this user_id (which is not the same as username).  If this is blank, then any user can send messages.
